price: 106. Markuu walaalkood Nuux ku yidhi: “Miyeydaan ka dhawrsaneyn (shirkiga)?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
